channel.title: Drop tables
channel.description:
This may be too much to ask, but I would greatly appreciate some [i]accurate[/i] drop tables for some of the more common NPC's in Runescape. If you could use the Runescape wiki to get all possible drops that would be great.
They can be in any format, but preferably the one I am using:
[code]NPCID ItemId:Min-Max:Ratio/Ratio ItemId2:Min-Max:Ratio/Ratio etc[/code] Example: [code]0001 0526:1-1:1/1 0995:1-35:7/10 2882 6729:1-1:1/1 6155:1-1:1/1[/code]
Thanks in advance for any help :)
